alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 8:57AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...LIGHT TO OCCASIONALLY MODERATE SNOW THIS MORNING... Light to occasionally moderate snow this morning may bring a half to 1 inch of snow in some locations. Snow will cause visibilities will be reduced to around 1 to 3 miles with some brief reductions to a half to three quarters of a mile possible. Slippery travel is possible, especially on less traveled and untreated roadways, and motorists should use extra caution if driving this morning as temperatures are below freezing. The light snow should end between 10 am and 12 pm.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
